formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: D = \begin{cases} \mathrm{Standard\ Deduction}(y,\ \mathrm{Single}) & \text{if standard is chosen} \\ \max\{0,\ \mathrm{Itemized}\} & \text{if itemized is chosen} \end{cases}
formulas.raw: D = \begin{cases} \mathrm{Standard\ Deduction}(y,\ \mathrm{Single}) & \text{if standard is chosen} \\ \max\{0,\ \mathrm{Itemized}\} & \text{if itemized is chosen} \end{cases}

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: $$\mathrm{AGI} = \max\{0,\ \mathrm{Gross\ Income} - \mathrm{Pre\text{-}tax\ Adjustments}\}$$ $$D = \begin{cases} \mathrm{Standard\ Deduction}(y,\ \mathrm{Single}) & \text{if standard is chosen} \\ \max\{0,\ \mathrm{Itemized}\} & \text{if itemized is chosen} \end{cases}$$ $$\mathrm{Taxable\ Income}\ (TI) = \max\{0,\ \mathrm{AGI} - D\}$$ $$T = \sum_i r_i \cdot \min\{\max(TI - L_i,\ 0),\ U_i - L_i\}$$ $$T_{\mathrm{final}} = \max\{0,\ T - C_{\mathrm{nonref}}\}$$ $$\mathrm{Effective\ Rate} = \frac{T_{\mathrm{final}}}{\mathrm{Gross\ Income}} \quad\quad \mathrm{Marginal\ Rate} = r_j \text{ for bracket } j \text{ where } TI \in (L_j, U_j]$$

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
